data.name: Hane-Hane
data.desc: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

data.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
data.desc: This legendery dragon is a powerful engine of destruction...

data.name: Judge Man
data.desc: This club-wielding warrior battels to the end and never surrenders

data.name: Swordstalker
data.desc: A monster formed by the vengeful souls of those who passed away in battle.

data.name: Gyakutenno Megami
data.desc: This fairy uses her mystical power to protect the weak and provide spiritual support

data.name: Rude Kaiser
data.desc: With an axe in each hand, this monster delivers heavy damage.

data.name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
data.desc: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.

data.name: Battle Ox
data.desc: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

data.name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
data.desc: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

data.name: Rogue Doll
data.desc: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

data.name: Skull Red Bird
data.desc: This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.

data.name: Kojikocy
data.desc: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders.

data.name: Koumori Dragon
data.desc: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

data.name: Pale Beast
data.desc: With skin tinged a bluish-white, this strange creature is a fearsome sight to behold.

data.name: Destroyer Golem
data.desc: A golem with a massive right hand for crushing its victims.

data.name: Mystic Clown
data.desc: Nothing can stop the mad attack of this powerful creature.

data.name: Uraby
data.desc: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

data.name: Mystic Horseman
data.desc: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

data.name: Dark Titan of Terror
data.desc: A fiend said to dwell in the world of dreams, it attacks enemies in their sleep.

data.name: D. Human
data.desc: Gifted with the power of dragons, this warrior wields a sword created from a dragon's fang.

data.name: Ogre of the Black Shadow
data.desc: An ogre possessed by the powers of the dark. Few can withstand its rapid charge.

data.name: Terra the Terrible
data.desc: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

data.name: Dark Assailant
data.desc: Armed with the Psycho Sword, this sinister assassin rules the bad land.

data.name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
data.desc: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

data.name: Master & Expert
data.desc: A deadly duo consisting of a beast master and its loyal servant.

data.name: Ryu-Kishin
data.desc: A very elusive creature that looks like a harmless statue until it attacks.

data.name: Unknown Warrior of Fiend
data.desc: The speed of this warrior creates an intense vacuum that can slice through a monster's hide.

data.name: Lord of D.
data.desc: Neither player can target Dragon monsters on the field with card effects.

data.name: Mysterious Puppeteer
data.desc: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

data.name: The Wicked Worm Beast
data.desc: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

data.name: Trap Master
data.desc: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

data.name: Dark Energy
data.desc: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Fiend-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points

data.name: Invigoration
data.desc: An EARTH monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

data.name: Sogen
data.desc: All Warrior and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

data.name: Dark Hole
data.desc: Destroy all monsters on the field.

data.name: De-Spell
data.desc: Target 1 face-up Spell, or 1 Set Spell/Trap, on the field; destroy that target if it is a Spell. (If the target is Set, reveal it.)

data.name: Ancient Telescope
data.desc: See the top 5 cards of your opponent's Deck. Return the cards to the Deck in the same order.

data.name: Monster Reborn
data.desc: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

data.name: Ookazi
data.desc: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Fissure
data.desc: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

data.name: Remove Trap
data.desc: Select 1 face-up Trap Card on the field and destroy it.

data.name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
data.desc: Special Summon up to 2 Dragon monsters from your hand. 'Lord of D.' must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

data.name: The Inexperienced Spy
data.desc: Select and see 1 card in your opponent's hand.

data.name: Ultimate Offering
data.desc: During your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase: You can pay 500 Life Points; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

data.name: Castle Walls
data.desc: Increase the DEF of 1 face-up monster on the field by 500 points until the end of this turn

data.name: Just Desserts
data.desc: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

data.name: Reinforcements
data.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

data.name: Reverse Trap
data.desc: Until the End Phase, all effects that add or subtract ATK or DEF are reversed. (Additions now subtract, and subtractions now add, instead. Multiplications and divisions, including halving/doubling, are not affected.)

data.name: Trap Hole
data.desc: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

data.name: Two-Pronged Attack
data.desc: Select and destroy 2 of your monsters and 1 of your opponent's monsters.
